markdown:
**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 29 --- You shed some of your material form, becoming a being of pure thought. This has the following effects.
  • You gain resistance 10 to physical damage but weakness 5 to mental damage and weakness 10 to any effect that deals damage by targeting the spirit, such as [_spirit blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=301).
  • You can change your appearance on a whim. This takes a single action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait, has the effects of [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), and lasts until you change your appearance again.
  • Once per year, when you die, you automatically return to life the next day as long as one living sentient creature on your plane remembers you; the memories enable you to reconstruct yourself from their thoughts. You appear in the vicinity of the creature that remembers you most strongly.
name: Become Thought
